title: Backend Engineer Screen
description: 30-minute HR + technical screening focusing on APIs and ownership.

config.job_description: Evaluate backend fundamentals and systems thinking.
questions: How do you approach designing a scalable API for a high-traffic application?
Describe a time you had to debug a complex issue in a production backend system?
Explain your experience with different database technologies and when you would choose one over another?

title: Backend Engineer Screening
description: This is a 20-minute HR + technical screen for backend fundamentals.

config.job_description: You’ll work on REST APIs, microservices, databases, and system design.

title: Frontend Engineer Screen
description: 30-minute HR + technical screening focusing on frontend fundamentals.

config.job_description: Evaluate frontend fundamentals, React, and UI/UX principles.
questions: How do you optimize the performance of a React application?
Describe a challenging bug you encountered in a frontend project and how you resolved it.
Explain your approach to ensuring accessibility in web applications.
